instruction: How does the performance of OC-SVM compare to SIMCA in the prediction of known data samples in the research on detecting adulterants in cassava starch using Raman spectroscopy?
Output: In the research on detecting adulterants in cassava starch using Raman spectroscopy, the performance of OC-SVM (one-class support vector machine) was found to be better than SIMCA (soft independent modelling by class analogy) in the prediction of known data samples. Additionally, OC-SVM was able to detect adulterations over 2%, while SIMCA could only detect adulterations over 5%.
